math-visualeditor-mwchemdialog-title: Title for the dialog to edit <nowiki><chem></nowiki> formula blocks.
math-visualeditor-mwcheminspector-title: Title for the inspector to edit <nowiki><chem></nowiki> formula blocks.
math-visualeditor-mwlatexcontextitem-qui: Label for the quick edit button in the math context item
math-visualeditor-mwlatexdialog-card-for:
Label for the generic formula card of the dialog for mathematics, chemistry, etc.
{{Identical|Formula}}
math-visualeditor-mwlatexdialog-card-opt:
Label for the options card of the formula dialog.
{{Identical|Options}}
math-visualeditor-mwlatexinspector-displ: Label for the display attribute of the math node. This attribute has two options, inline and block. With inline, there will be no new paragraph for the equation and the operators will be rendered consuming only little vertical space. In block style, the equation is rendered in its own paragraph and the operators are rendered consuming less horizontal space. {{Identical|Display}}

Label for the 'block' value of the display attribute
{{Identical|Block}}

Label for the 'default' value of the display attribute
{{Identical|Default}}

Label for the 'inline' value of the display attribute
{{Identical|Inline}}
math-visualeditor-mwlatexinspector-id: Label for the link ID attribute of the math node
math-visualeditor-mwmathdialog-title: Title for the dialog to edit <nowiki><math></nowiki> formula blocks.
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-addi: Label for the addition compounds group of chem symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-aggr: Label for the states of aggregation group of chem symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-arro: Label for the reaction arrows group of chem symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-brac: Label for the parenthesis, brackets & braces group of chem symbols

Label for the charges group of chem symbols

math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-dots: Label for the unpaired electrons & radical dots group of chem symbols

math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-form: Label for the chemical formulae group of chem symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-gree: Label for the greek characters group of chem symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-isot: Label for the isotopes group of chem symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-oper: Label for the equation operators group of chem symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-oxid: Label for the oxidation states group of chem symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-prec: Label for the precipitate and gas group of chem symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-chem-stoi: Label for the stoichiometric numbers group of chem symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-acce: Label for the accents group of math symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-arro:
Label for the arrows group of math symbols

math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-boun: Label for the bounds group of math symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-deri: Label for the derivatives group of math symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-func: Label for the functions group of math symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-geom: Label for the geometry group of math symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-gree: Label for the Greek group of math symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-hebr: Label for the Hebrew group of math symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-larg: Label for the large group of math symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-logi:
Label for the logic group of math symbols
{{Identical|Logic}}
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-matr: Label for the matrices group of math symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-modu: Label for the modular group of math symbols
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-oper:
Label for the operators group of math symbols
{{Identical|Operator}}
math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-pare:
Label for the parentheses group of math symbols

math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-proj: Label for the projections group of math symbols

Label for the relations group of math symbols

Label for the sets group of math symbols

math-visualeditor-symbol-group-math-subs: Label for the subscripts group of math symbols

math_invalidjson:
Used as error message.

Parameters:
* $1 - rendering type (either LaTeXML or Mathoid)

This message follows the message {{msg-mw|Math failure}}.
math_invalidresponse:
Used as error message.

Follows the message {{msg-mw|Math failure}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - rendering type (either LaTeXML or Mathoid)
* $2 - hostname
* $3 - error message
math_invalidxml:
Used as error message.

This message follows the message {{msg-mw|Math failure}}.
math_mathoid_error:
Used as error message.

Follows the message {{msg-mw|Math failure}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - hostname
* $2 - error message retrieved from the server
math-status-introduction:
Used as special-page text.

Parameters:
* $1 mode count
math_timeout:
Used as error message.

Parameters:
* $1 - rendering type (either LaTeXML or Mathoid)
* $2 - hostname or URL
math-test-end:
Used as special-page text.

Parameters:
* $1 rendering mode

Note: The $1 is in two single quotes and not in double quotes.
math-test-fail:
Used as special-page text.

Parameters:
* $1 test name

Note: The $1 is in two single quotes and not in double quotes.
math-test-start:
Used as special-page text.

Parameters:
* $1 rendering mode

Note: The $1 is in two single quotes and not in double quotes.
math-test-success:
Used as special-page text.

Parameters:
* $1 test name

Note: The $1 is in two single quotes and not in double quotes.
math-test-contains-diff:
Used as special-page wikitext.

Parameters:
* $1 syntax highlight element of the returned string 
* $2 syntax highlight element of the expected string
math-test-equals-diff:
Used as special-page wikitext.

Parameters:
* $1 syntax highlight element of the returned string 
* $2 syntax highlight element of the expected string
math_unknown_function:
Used as error message when texvc encounters an unknown function.

Preceded by the message {{msg-mw|Math failure}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - name of unknown function
prefs-math:
Used in user preferences as a section heading.
{{Identical|Math}}
mathstatus: Title of a special page that displays information about the enabled math rendering modes.
mathwikibase: Title of a special page that displays information about a mathematical Wikibase item.
math-wikibase-formula:
Label for the inline header for formulae
{{Identical|Formula}}
math-wikibase-formula-name:
Label for the name of the formula
{{Identical|Name}}
math-wikibase-formula-type: Label for the type of the formula
math-wikibase-formula-header-format:
{{Optional}}

The pattern to organize label $1 with information $2
math-wikibase-formula-description: Label for the description of the formula
math-wikibase-formula-information: Header for information section of the formula
math-wikibase-formula-link-header: Header for the hyperlink section to wikibase of the formula
math-wikibase-formula-elements-header: Header for the elements section of the forumla
math-wikibase-special-form-header: The header of the form to request a wikibase id from user.
math-wikibase-special-form-placeholder: The placeholder of input field where a user can request a wikibase id.
math-wikibase-special-form-button: The button label to submits the form to request a wikibase id.
math-wikibase-special-error-header:
The header of the error page. Will be shown when an error occurred on the special page.
{{Identical|Error}}
math-wikibase-special-error-invalid-argu: The error text if the requested wikibase does not exist.
math-wikibase-special-error-unknown:
The error text when an unkown error occurred during fetching the information.
Further information about the error can be found in the logs.
math-wikibase-special-error-no-wikibase: The error text that show up when the required Wikibase extension is missing.
